title: TFR Ep. 594: Blacklight, Kimi, 5 Favorite Soderbergh Scenes
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss Liam Neeson doing Liam Neeson things in ‘Blacklight’.  Has the shine on the King of January & February Cinema’s crown started to dull?  Then it’s on to the latest from Mr. Steven Soderbergh, it’s ‘Kimi’, featuring Zoë Kravitz in a Rear Window-esque thriller for the electronic assistant age. There’s the rejuvenating rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the big show by sharing their 5 Favorite Soderbergh Scenes!

00:00-10:12: Intro/Blacklight

10:13-23:26: Physical Media Picks

23:27-34:31: Kimi

34:32-57:13: 5 Favorite Soderbergh Scenes

57:14-58:40: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook
